system.availability: Pre-existing Bionic Arm is fitted with a Pistol or short single-handed melee weapon, can be deployed and readied as a Half Action.Weapon cannot be Disarmed and requires detailed inspection/auspex scan to find. A Jam/Overheat disables the limb as well as the weapon. Poor: Weapon gains Unreliable Quality, Good: Weapon functions as Best Craftsmanship.
system.cost:
Cost does not include Bionic Arm or Weapon
Poor costs 150, Good is Rare and costs 750
